meanings.definition: Used to refer to a female person or animal previously mentioned or easily identified.
meanings.sent2: I saw her at the park.
meanings.sent3: She loves to chase squirrels in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The cat thinks she is the queen of the house.
meanings.sent5: In the story, she is the brave heroine who saves the day.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to a female person or animal as the object of a verb or preposition.
meanings.sent1: He gave the ball to her.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised her for her hard work.
meanings.sent3: The dog followed her everywhere, hoping for a treat.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight illuminated her face as she danced.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured her beauty in every brushstroke.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to a female person or animal as the subject of a verb.
meanings.sent3: She giggled uncontrollably at the silly joke.
meanings.sent4: The sun sets as she runs along the beach.
meanings.sent5: In the play, she delivers a powerful monologue that moves the audience.
